title: Filipino Lawyer Needed – Contract Drafting & Legal Oversight for eCommerce Franchise
job_overview:
To Apply Contact Me On WhatsAPP:Upgrade to see actual infoWe are looking for a licensed Filipino lawyer to assist with the drafting of contracts and legal protection for a remote eCommerce franchise we are building.

 Job Description:

You will help us:
 • Draft solid legal contracts between our company and Filipino workers operating eBay seller accounts.
 • Ensure that funds received by these workers are properly managed and protected by contract.
 • Include strong legal clauses to prevent fraud, theft, or misuse of accounts or money.
 • Be available to review alerts or signals of fraud and pursue legal action against the worker in the Philippines if necessary.

 Requirements:
 • Licensed lawyer based in the Philippines.
 • Experience with contract law, employment agreements, and/or eCommerce is a plus.
 • Ability to draft enforceable legal agreements under Philippine law.
 • Fluent in English (written and spoken).
 • Available for ongoing legal review if needed (paid per case or monthly retainer).

Objective:

We want to make sure all Filipino employees understand their obligations clearly, and that our company is fully protected from any legal risk. In case of any issue, your role will be to investigate, advise, and pursue justice if needed.
